options.name: Eye of Errahman
options.description: The bearer and R&F models in the bearer's unit gain Battle Focus. In addition, for each natural to-hit roll of ‘1’ with a Close Combat Attack made by the bearer's unit, the bearer's unit suffers 1 hit with Strength 3 and Armour Penetration 0 in the same Initiative Step. This is considered a Special Attack.

options.name: Martyr's Shroud
options.description: R&F models with Cult of Errahman in the bearer's unit gain Fortitude (6+).

options.name: Orator's Toga
options.description: The bearer gains Stand Behind and cannot issue Duels.

options.name: Putrid Pamphlet
options.description: The bearer’s unit must reroll natural to-hit rolls of ‘1’.

options.name: Crucible of Contagion
options.description: The bearer’s model gains +1 Health Point, and enemy units in base contact with the bearer’s model suffer -1 Resilience.

options.name: Plague Prophet's Blessing
options.description: The wearer gains +1 Health Point and Fortitude (5+). Successful to-hit rolls with Close Combat Attacks against the wearer must be rerolled.

options.name: Toxic Incense
options.description: While using this weapon, the wielder gains Grind Attacks (D3) that are resolved with Toxic Attacks at Initiative Step 10.

options.name: Pestilential Wrath
options.description: Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Armour Penetration. In addition, attacks with a natural to-hit roll of ‘6’ made with this weapon become Divine Attacks and gain Multiple Wounds (D3).
